content:
Laasarine nikshepicha-besaniyaayil vanneeshan
Priyane kabaril vachittu -naallannaallil naalaayi.
Adbhutha darshanamohatthaal-sarvvamathasthharumingetthi
Vishvaasatthaal daivatthin-maahaathmyam kaanum ningall
Rakshakanevam ghoshichaan-ezhunnelkkuka lovosaare.
Avanuththhaanam praapichu-sambhramamaandu krthaghnanmaar.
